1.title: Save Me

episode of.title: Here or There: New Generation (TV Mini-Series 2015)

1.plot: A detective is investigating about Alisa's vanishing. Alisa was a student of Marc, a foreigner professor, and girlfriend too. Marc is on the top of the detective's suspected list. The detective found in the Marc house a CD called Here or There, which shows some places around the world. One of these is a stream close to Marc house. In there the detective found the Alisa necklace.

2.title: Come Across

episode of.title: Here or There: New Generation (TV Mini-Series 2015)

2.plot: Marc back home. He is still falls in love of Alisa. He remembers the day when he gave the necklace to Alisa. And when Alisa was changing her personality without understand the reason. Without understand that another man was running for her. To the library, surfing internet Marc discovers that many girls are vanished in all of the world, without apparently reasons.

3.title: Altroquando

episode of.title: Here or There: New Generation (TV Mini-Series 2015)

3.plot: Ke Ke and her husband are going to his brother's party by car, when they get an accident. Her husband decides to get out, trying to find somebody can help them to fix the car. But he became a unlucky witness at the moment that the other man bites Alisa, changing her personality and her life forever as a vampire.

4.title: Memories

episode of.title: Here or There: New Generation (TV Mini-Series 2015)

4.plot: The other man, now a vampire, still remembers when he known his previous girlfriend Rowena, who looks like Alisa. Rowena killed herself when she discovers she failed her final examination to the University. The man killed himself too. But he doesn't die: another vampire bites him before he falls down. Marc runs the man to kill him. But.
